title: Nvidia Gives Revenue Warning, Deal Flow Could Accelerate in 2019, Facebook Watch Struggles
itunes:title: Nvidia Gives Revenue Warning, Deal Flow Could Accelerate in 2019, Facebook Watch Struggles
description:
Ryan Vlastelica, Bloomberg News Equities Reporter, and Angelo Zino, Senior Equity Analyst at CFRA, break down Nvidia cutting its outlook for fourth-quarter revenue and how that news is impacting the chipmaker sector. Howard Lanser, Head of Global Debt Advisory at Baird, discusses the finance market outlook for M&A. Sarah Frier, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, explains why Facebook Watch is struggling to attract viewers and advertisers. And we check the equity and bond markets with Mark Giambrone, Equity Portfolio Manager at Barrow Hanley and Joe Kalish, Chief Global Macro Strategist at Ned Davis Research. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
